00050 template<class T>
00051 class TimeSeries {
00052 public:
00053     TimeSeries() {
00054       init();
00055     }
00056 
00057     TimeSeries(const std::vector<T> &inp) {
00058       _data = inp; 
00059     }
00060 
00061     TimeSeries(const int size, const T *array) {
00062       _data.reserve(size);
00063       for (unsigned int i=0; i<size; i++) {
00064         _data.push_back(array[i]);
00065       }
00066     }
00067 
00068     TimeSeries(const TimeSeries<T> &inp) {
00069       _data = inp._data;
00070     }
00071 
00072     TimeSeries(const int n, const T val) {
00073       _data.assign(n, (T) val);
00074     }
00075 
00076 
00080     TimeSeries (const std::string &filename, const int col=2) {
00081         std::ifstream ifs(filename.c_str());
00082         if (!ifs) {
00083             throw(std::runtime_error("Cannot open timeseries file " 
00084                                      + filename));
00085         }
00086 
00087         std::string line;
00088         while (ifs.good()) {
00089             getline(ifs, line);
00090             if ( (line.substr(0,1) == "#") || (line.empty()) ){
00091                 // comment -- do nothing
00092             }
00093             else {
00094                 std::stringstream s(line);
00095                 double val;
00096                 int i=0;
00097                 while (i < col) {
00098                     if (!s.good()) {
00099                   throw(std::runtime_error("Problem reading timeseries file "
00100                                            + filename));
00101                     }
00102                     s >> val;
00103                     i++;
00104                 }
00105                 _data.push_back(val);    
00106             }
00107         }
00108     }
00109 
00110 
00111 
00112     void init(void) {
00113       _data.clear();
00114     }
00115 
00116     void zero(void) {
00117       _data.assign(_data.size(), (T)0.0);
00118     }
00119 
00120     T& operator[](const unsigned int i) {
00121       return (_data.at(i)); // this way we get range checking
00122     }
00123 
00124     const T& operator[](const unsigned int i) const  {
00125       return (_data.at(i)); // this way we get range checking
00126     }
00127 
00128     unsigned int size(void) const {
00129       return (_data.size());
00130     }

00132     TimeSeries<T> operator+=(const T val) {
00133       for (unsigned int i=0; i<_data.size(); i++) {
00134         _data[i] += val;
00135       }
00136       return(*this);
00137     }
00138 
00139     TimeSeries<T> operator+=(const TimeSeries<T> &rhs) {
00140       if (_data.size() != rhs.size())
00141         throw(std::runtime_error("mismatched timeseries sizes in +="));
00142       for (unsigned int i=0; i<_data.size(); i++) {
00143         _data[i] += rhs[i];
00144       }
00145       return(*this);
00146     }
00147 
00148     TimeSeries<T> operator+(const T val) const {
00149       TimeSeries<T> res(*this);
00150       for (unsigned int i=0; i<_data.size(); i++) {
00151         res[i] += val;
00152       }
00153       return(res);
00154     }
00155 
00156 
00157     friend TimeSeries<T> operator+(const T lhs, const TimeSeries<T> &rhs) {
00158       TimeSeries<T> res( rhs.size(), (T) 0.0 );
00159       for (unsigned int i=0; i<rhs.size(); i++) {
00160         res[i] = lhs + rhs[i];
00161       }
00162       return(res);
00163     }

00166       if (_data.size() != rhs.size())
00167         throw(std::runtime_error("mismatched timeseries sizes in +="));
00168 
00169       TimeSeries<T> res(*this);
00170       for (unsigned int i=0; i<res.size(); i++) {
00171         res[i] += rhs[i];
00172       }
00173       return(res);
00174     }

00178         _data[i] -= val;
00179       }
00180       return(*this);

00183     TimeSeries<T> operator-=(const TimeSeries<T> &rhs) {
00184       if (_data.size() != rhs.size())
00185         throw(std::runtime_error("mismatched sizes of time series"));
00186       for (unsigned int i=0; i<_data.size(); i++) {
00187         _data[i] -= rhs[i];
00188       }
00189       return(*this);

00195         res[i] -= val;

00197       return(res);

00201       if (_data.size() != rhs.size())
00202         throw(std::runtime_error("mismatched timeseries sizes in +="));
00203 
00204       TimeSeries<T> res(*this);
00205       for (unsigned int i=0; i<res.size(); i++) {

00213     TimeSeries<T> operator-() const {
00214       TimeSeries<T> res(*this);
00215       for (unsigned int i=0; i<_data.size(); i++) {
00216         res[i] = -res[i];
00217       }
00218       return(res);
00219     }

00221     friend TimeSeries<T> operator-(const T lhs, const TimeSeries<T> &rhs) {
00222       TimeSeries<T> res( rhs.size() );
00223       for (unsigned int i=0; i<rhs.size(); i++) {
00224         res[i] = lhs - rhs[i];
00225       }
00226       return(res);
00227     }

00241       return(res);

00244     TimeSeries<T> operator*=(const TimeSeries<T> &rhs) {
00245       if ( _data.size() != rhs.size() ) 
00246         throw(std::runtime_error("mismatched timeseries sizes in *="));
00247       for (unsigned int i=0; i<_data.size(); i++) {

00264     friend TimeSeries<T> operator*(const T lhs, const TimeSeries<T> &rhs) {
00265       TimeSeries<T> res( rhs.size(), (T) 0.0 );

00297     TimeSeries<T> operator/(const TimeSeries<T> &rhs) const {
00298       if ( _data.size() != rhs.size() ) 
00299         throw(std::runtime_error("mismatched timeseries sizes in *="));
00300 
00301       TimeSeries<T> res(*this);
00302       for (unsigned int i=0; i<_data.size(); i++) {
00303         res[i] /= rhs[i];

00308     friend TimeSeries<T> operator/(const T lhs, const TimeSeries<T> &rhs) {
00309       TimeSeries<T> res( rhs.size() );
00310       for (unsigned int i=0; i<rhs.size(); i++) {
00311         res[i] = lhs / rhs[i];
00312       }
00313       return(res);
00314     }

00316     TimeSeries<T> copy(void) const {
00317       TimeSeries<T> result(_data.size(), 0.0);
00318       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < _data.size(); i++) {
00319         result[i] = _data[i];
00320       }
00321       return(result);
00322     }
00323 
00325     T average(void) const {
00326       T ave = 0.0;
00327       for (unsigned int i=0; i < _data.size(); i++) {
00328         ave += _data[i];
00329       }
00330       ave /= _data.size();
00331       return (ave);
00332     }
00333 
00335     T variance(void) const {
00336       T ave = 0.0;
00337       T ave2 = 0.0;
00338       for (unsigned int i=0; i < _data.size(); i++) {
00339         ave += _data[i];
00340         ave2 += _data[i] * _data[i];
00341       }
00342 
00343       ave /= _data.size();
00344       ave2 /= _data.size();
00345       return (ave2 - ave*ave);
00346     }
00347 
00349     T stdev(void) const {
00350       return (sqrt(variance() ));
00351     }
00352 
00357     T sterr(void) const {
00358       return (stdev() / sqrt(_data.size()));  
00359     }
00360 
00363     TimeSeries<T> running_average(void) const {
00364       TimeSeries<T> result(_data.size() );
00365       T sum = 0.0;
00366       for (unsigned int i=0; i<_data.size(); i++) {
00367         sum += _data[i];
00368         result[i] = sum / (i+1);
00369       }
00370       return(result);
00371 
00372     }
00373 
00378     TimeSeries<T> windowed_average(const int window) const {
00379 
00380       if (window > _data.size() )
00381         throw(std::out_of_range("Error in windowed_average: window too large"));
00382 
00383       TimeSeries result(_data.size() - window);
00384       T sum = 0;
00385       for (int i=0; i<window; i++) {
00386         sum += _data[i];
00387       }
00388       result[0] = sum / window;
00389 
00390 
00391       for (unsigned int i=1; i < result.size(); i++) {
00392         sum = sum - _data[i-1] + _data[i+window-1];
00393         result[i] = sum / window;
00394       }
00395     }
00396 
00402     T block_var(const int num_blocks) const {
00403       int points_per_block = this->size() / num_blocks;
00404       T block_ave = 0.0;
00405       T block_ave2 = 0.0;
00406       for (int i=0; i<num_blocks; i++) {
00407         T block_sum = 0.0;
00408         int offset = i*points_per_block;
00409         for (int j=0; j< points_per_block; j++) {
00410           block_sum += _data[offset + j];
00411         }
00412         T ave = block_sum / points_per_block;
00413         block_ave += ave;
00414         block_ave2 += ave*ave;
00415       }
00416       block_ave /= num_blocks;
00417       block_ave2 /= num_blocks;
00418       return (block_ave2 - block_ave*block_ave);
00419     }
00420 
00421     TimeSeries<T> correl(const int max_time, 
00422                          const int interval=1, 
00423                          const bool normalize=true,
00424                          T tol=1.0e-8) const {
00425 
00426       TimeSeries<T> data = copy();
00427       uint n = abs(max_time);
00428       if (n > data.size()) {
00429         throw(std::runtime_error("Can't take correlation time longer than time series"));
00430       }
00431 
00432       n /= interval;
00433       TimeSeries<T> c(n, 0.0);
00434 
00435       // normalize the data
00436       if (normalize) {
00437           data -= data.average();
00438           T dev = data.stdev();
00439             
00440           // drop through if this is a constant array
00441           if (dev < tol) {
00442             c._data.assign(n, 1.0);
00443             return(c);
00444           }
00445             
00446           data /= dev;
00447       }
00448 
00449       std::vector<int> num_pairs(n);
00450       num_pairs.assign(n, 0);
00451       // TODO: This is the O(N^2) way -- there are much faster
00452       // algorithms for long time series
00453       for (int i = 0; i < max_time; i+=interval) {
00454         int index = i / interval;
00455         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < data.size() - i; j++) {
00456           c[index] += data[j] * data[j+i];
00457           num_pairs[index]++;
00458         }
00459 
00460       }
00461 
00462       // Divide each value by the number of pairs used to generated it
00463       for (uint i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00464         c[i] /= num_pairs[i];
00465       }
00466 
00467       return(c);
00468     }
00469 
00470 private:
00471     std::vector<T> _data;
00472 };
